title: Introduction to Computer Science
description: A beginner's course on the fundamentals of computer science, including programming basics, algorithms, and data structures.

title: Advanced Machine Learning
description: An advanced course focusing on machine learning techniques, including deep learning, natural language processing, and reinforcement learning.

title: Data Science with Python
description: A comprehensive course on data science using Python, covering data analysis, visualization, and statistical modeling.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
description: An intensive bootcamp on web development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks such as React and Angular.
